posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice high-grade purple blanket of Bill McAllister from the St Louis AL Browns. I have collected this set on several occasions and always found the McAllister pose to be one of the most desirable. This one has four nice borders, excellent color and clarity. Catchers possess are always popular and tough to find especially in high grade like this one
39.99 plus 5.00 for shipping and tracking Net prices
